description:
Job summaryThe Director of Sponsorship Sales, Twitch Properties will be based in either our Los Angeles or San Francisco offices and report to the Regional Vice President, West in the Amazon Advertising group based out of LA.
This individual will be tasked with championing first and third party property rights to deliver world class solutions for our clients, These first and third party assets are found in a variety of verticals including:
esports and gaming, events, sports, music, and influencers to designated clients located within the western territory of the United States.
Key job responsibilities? Achieve revenue targets through multi-year agreements? Be a consultative and creative partner to clients and sponsorship agencies to develop meaningful custom solutions? Work collaboratively with key teams internally including, but not limited to, Original Content, Legal, Business Development, Operations, Marketing and the broader sales group? Clearly learn and express the value and benefits of Twitch's Sponsorship products & audience to clients and agencies? Own the IP rights, hospitality, promotional rights, media and event strategy for clients? Work collaboratively with global Sales and Marketing teams to identify key opportunities of sales and opportunity for growthAbout the teamLaunched in 2011, Twitch is a global community that comes together each day to create multiplayer entertainment:
unique, live, unpredictable experiences created by the interactions of millions.
We bring the joy of co-op to everything, from casual gaming to world-class esports to anime marathons, music, and art streams.
Twitch also hosts TwitchCon, where we bring everyone together to celebrate, learn, and grow their personal interests and passions.
We're always live at Twitch.
Stay up to date on all things Twitch on Linkedin, Twitter and on our Blog.
.
Estimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
